javadoc: Tool that serves as the the Ghidra Project Window. Only those plugins that implement the FrontEndable interface may be directly added to this tool by the user. Other plugins that are not marked as FrontEndable may get pulled in because the FrontEndable plugins depend on them. These plugins are aware of what tool they live in so that they can behave in the appropriate manner.

methods.javadoc:
Construct a new Ghidra Project Window.
@param pm project manager
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Construct a new Ghidra Project Window.

params.name: pm
params.comment: project manager

methods.javadoc:
Set the active project.
@param project may be null if there is no active project
methods.name: setActiveProject

params.name: project
params.comment: may be null if there is no active project

methods.javadoc:
Add the given project listener.
@param l listener to add
methods.name: addProjectListener

params.name: l
params.comment: listener to add

methods.javadoc:
Remove the given project listener.
@param l listener to remove
methods.name: removeProjectListener

params.name: l
params.comment: listener to remove

methods.name: checkRepositoryConnected
methods.comment: NOTE: do not call this from a non-Swing thread

params.name: tool
params.comment: the tool

return.comment: true if the repository is null or is connected.

methods.name: checkIn
methods.comment: Check in the given domain file.

params.name: tool
params.comment: tool that has the domain file opened

params.name: domainFile
params.comment: domain file to check in

params.name: taskListener
params.comment: listener that is notified when task completes

methods.name: checkIn
methods.comment: Check in the list of domain files.

params.name: tool
params.comment: tool that has the domain files opened

params.name: fileList
params.comment: list of DomainFile objects

params.name: taskListener
params.comment: listener that is notified when task completes

params.name: parent
params.comment: parent of dialog if an error occurs during checkin

methods.name: merge
methods.comment:
Merge the latest version in the repository with the given checked out
 domain file. Upon completion of the merge, the domain file appears as
 though the latest version was checked out.

params.name: tool
params.comment: tool that has the domain file opened

params.name: domainFile
params.comment: domain file where latest version will be merged into

params.name: taskListener
params.comment:
listener that is notified when the merge task
            completes

methods.name: merge
methods.comment:
Merge the latest version (in the repository) of each checked out file in
 fileList. Upon completion of the merge, the domain file appears as though
 the latest version was checked out.

params.name: tool
params.comment: tool that has the domain files opened

params.name: fileList
params.comment: list of files that are checked out and are to be merged

params.name: taskListener
params.comment:
listener that is notified when the merge task
            completes

methods.javadoc:
Add those plugins that implement the FrontEndable interface and have a
 RELEASED status and not (example || testing) category.
methods.name: addFrontEndablePlugins
methods.comment:
Add those plugins that implement the FrontEndable interface and have a
 RELEASED status and not (example || testing) category.

methods.javadoc:
Refresh the plugins in the Ghidra Project Window based on what is
 contained in the given XML Element.
@param tc object that contains an entry for each plugin and its
            configuration state
methods.name: refresh
methods.comment:
Refresh the plugins in the Ghidra Project Window based on what is
 contained in the given XML Element.

params.name: tc
params.comment:
object that contains an entry for each plugin and its
            configuration state

methods.name: parse
methods.comment: Get the int value for the given string.

params.name: value
params.comment: the string value to parse

params.name: defaultValue
params.comment:
return this value if a NumberFormatException is
            thrown during the parseInt() method

methods.javadoc:
Check the "What's New" preference; if it has not been set, then show the
 "What's New" help page. This should only happen if the preference was
 never set.
methods.name: checkWhatsNewPreference
methods.comment:
Check the "What's New" preference; if it has not been set, then show the
 "What's New" help page. This should only happen if the preference was
 never set.

name: FrontEndTool
comment:
Tool that serves as the the Ghidra Project Window. Only those plugins that
 implement the FrontEndable interface may be directly added to this
 tool by the user. Other plugins that are not marked as FrontEndable may get
 pulled in because the FrontEndable plugins depend on them. These plugins are
 aware of what tool they live in so that they can behave in the appropriate
 manner.

fields.javadoc:
Preference name for whether to show the "What's New" help page when the
 Ghidra Project Window is displayed.
fields.name: GHIDRA_SHOW_WHATS_NEW
fields.comment:
Preference name for whether to show the "What's New" help page when the
 Ghidra Project Window is displayed.

fields.javadoc:
Window state preference for the location of the divider for the split
 pane in the Ghidra Project Window. The divider is visible when another
 project view is opened.
fields.name: GHIDRA_MAIN_PANEL_DIVIDER_LOC
fields.comment:
Window state preference for the location of the divider for the split
 pane in the Ghidra Project Window. The divider is visible when another
 project view is opened.
